full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ME NYAMS CHEN MO'I SBYOR BA CES BYA BA DPAL LDAN ZUR MKHAR BA'I KHYAD CHOS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @091A *, ,DE NAS ZHIB PAR BTAGS SE 'BRU DANG SBYAR BAS, ,BAD KAN SKYA BO THAMS CAD 'JOMS, ,GRANG BA'I DMU CHU LA BU RAM DANG SBYAR LA BTANG, ,GRAD RLUD RGYAS PA LA CHANG GAR MOS PHUL LA BTANG, GZHAN RNAMS LA THAL SMAN RKYANG PA CHU BSKOL GYI PHUL NAS BTAD NA RDO RJE PHA LAM DANG 'DRA STE, GRAD SKRAN THAMS CAD 'JIGS, KHOD 'BRAS GRAGR SRIN GYI KHAR MA ZHU BA THAMS CAD 'JOMS, DMU RJDZING DAG GRANG RNAG ,'OR SKYA RBAB CHU SER THAMS CAD SKYEMS TE, ,MDOR NA GRANG BA'I NAD MA LUS PA 'JOMS PA'I MAN NGAG ME NYAMS CHEN MO'I SBYOR BA DPAL LDA PHYAG PA'I KHYAD CHOS LAS,
